summary: Email correspondence among legal team members discussing edits to jury instructions for a case, likely related to the Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell prosecution. The document shows collaboration on legal strategy and preparation of court materials.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the initial jury instructions letter and appears to be coordinating with the legal team for edits and feedback.

events.title: Jury Instructions Preparation
events.description: Legal team exchanges edits and feedback on a jury instructions letter for an upcoming case.

keyFacts: Email correspondence dated November 20-21, 2021 discussing jury instructions for a legal case.
Involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
Shows collaborative editing process with attachments of draft jury instructions.
Indicates ongoing legal preparation, likely related to the Epstein/Maxwell case given the context and dataset.
Document is part of the EFTA00014660.pdf file in Data Set 8 of Epstein case documents.
